Title: DNN CodeSmith Module Template
Description:
A set of Code smith templates to generate a c-sharp project as a DotNetNuke module. Your module first version is ready as early as you run the script successfully.

DNN Version: 4.9.5 compatible 
Language of output files: C Sharp
HomeWiki:
Project Description

A set of Code smith templates to generate a c-sharp project as a DotNetNuke module. Your module first version is ready as early as you run the script successfully.

DNN Version: 4.9.5 compatible
Language of output files: C Sharp

How It Works

Design your table in database and let this code smith script generate the complete c-sharp project for the module.

Contents Generated

A VS2005 compatible project file that contains following items:
  • Module definition file (.dnn)
  • Manage, add/edit and view user controls
  • Resource files for every control generated
  • Install and Uninstall SQL Scripts
  • NAnt-build file.

After sucessful generation of code files, just build the project file and obtain the ready-to-use zip file for deployement.
